Select custom bootanimation. On every change, the current animation will be backed up to the AICP_backup folder in your internal storage. Old ones must be deleted manually if not needed.

Notification preview in status bar instead of heads up

Navigation bar must and will be automatically disabled!

Available gestures:

Back
- Swipe up on left or right side

Home
- Swipe up center

Recent apps
- Swipe up center and hold

Long press home
- Short swipe up and hold in the center
Use bottom swipe up gestures for navigation\nNavigation bar must be disabled!

A unique and fully customizable gesture-based navigation bar
Back and Home must always be set. To change Back or Home assignments, set the desired assignment first.\n\nEnabling double-tap actions produces a slight delay with single-tap responsiveness.
Setting actions to only right/left will split touch areas amongst entire bar.
Threshold tuning is based on width/height percentage of Fling interface area

Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off

Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of minutes to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of minutes to wait before performing actions after screen on

Ambient Music Ticker shows playing music track info within Ambient display screen.

It's triggered also if Ambient Display is disabled when a new track is started, forcing a clean ambient screen with track info in the middle of the screen.

You can also double tap on track info to skip track.

If you own a Pixel and enable Now Playing and its notification in system Audio settings, Ambient Music Ticker will also work within it.
Off to supress/on to enable to play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Configure the behaviour of the device\'s hardware buttons
